short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apple Sliced searches the web for the lowest prices on Apple products. Visit Apple Sliced before purchasing your next Mac or iPad!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Apple Sliced is the best place to buy Apple products.

By using a range of merchants, calculating shipping rates, and including your sales tax rate, we help you track the lowest prices on Apple products. In addition to up to date pricing and availability, we provide descriptions about products, quizzes to find the right products to buy, and a blog to guide you through the fun world of Apple Culture.

We do it because we believe Apple creates some of the best products available, and we believe that consumers deserve to find the best prices and the most complete pricing information.
